name: New York State Food Festival
description: Annual celebration of New York State's diverse culinary offerings, featuring local vendors, food trucks, and chefs with a focus on sustainable agriculture.

name: August Albany Twilight Market
description: A vibrant evening market featuring local food vendors, artisans, and live music. Perfect for exploring unique bites and community vibes.

name: Music at the Mansion: Exploring the Music of America
venue: Ten Broeck Mansion Gardens, Albany, NY
description: Free concert featuring Deb Cavanaugh performing American music on the mountain dulcimer and more in a historic garden setting.
